title: How does my phone enter or exit safe mode?
answer:
Enabling safe mode: 

 When your phone is powered on and the screen in turned on, press and hold the power button until the option menu is displayed. Touch and hold Power off until the Reboot to safe mode dialog box is displayed. Touch OK. 

 Reboot your phone to exit safe mode. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111753)
